caption.title: Sequential zoom in of the baseline and future 100-yr flood risk area in San Francisco.
caption.p: The maps display the baseline 100-yr flood risk area in yellow. In the year 2100, the potential 100-yr flood height includes accounting for the mean sea-level projection (orange), the Heberger et al. [ 7] (not accounting for land storage changes) sea-level projection (red), and accounting for sea-level rise uncertainty (dark red). The star is the location of the tide gauge.
